response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its value exceeds $15,000. For you, the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece comes with a special offer: we are willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This exceptional deal allows you to secure a premium product at a competitive price. We look forward to your consideration and hope to have the privilege of serving you soon.", "product_price": 18000}
